subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nick Palmieri scored twice and the United States scored four third-period goals to beat Norway, 4-2, in Kosice, Slovakia, and advance to the second round of the world championships.
snippet: Nick Palmieri scored twice and the United States scored four third-period goals to beat Norway, 4-2, in Kosice, Slovakia, and advance to the second round of the world championships.
